content: डामर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Terrific, dreadful, awful; पर्याप्तं मयि रमणीयडामरत्वं संधत्ते गगनतलप्रयाणवेगः <ls>Māl. 5. 3.</ls> {@--2@} Riotous, tumultuous. {@--3@} Resembling, having the appearance ({%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} lovely, beautiful); रतिगलिते ललिते कुसुमानि शिखंडकडामरे (चिकुरे) <ls>Gīt. 12.</ls> --रः {@--1@} An uproar, rout, affray, riot. {@--2@} The bustle and confusion of festivity or strife. {@--3@} Any surprising sight. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of a mixed caste.
